author.literal: Context: Domani Marco e Maria descriveranno a Gianni se stessi. Tomorrow Mark and Mary will-describe to John themselves ‘Tomorrow, Mark and Mary will describe themselves to John.’ a.

note: No. (They) to-him have already described yesterday, to John, themselves ‘No. They already described themselves to John YESTERDAY.’ b. *No. proi lii hanno già descritti IERIF, a GianniR, se stessiR,i. No. (They) them have already described yesterday, to John, themselves ‘No. They already described themselves to John YESTERDAY.’ c. *No. proi glij-e-lii hanno già descritti IERIF, a Giannij,R, se stessiR,i. No. (They) to-him-prt-them have already described yesterday, to John, themselves ‘No. They already described themselves to John YESTERDAY.’
